con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="FlightService" targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" xmlns:fli="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" xmlns:tns="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:documentation> <abstractWSDL>http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/FlightService!1.0/WSDLs/FlightService.wsdl</abstractWSDL> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/FlightService/FlightService?XSD=../Schemas/FlightService.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getFlightDetailsRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:getFlightDetailsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getFlightDetailsResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:getFlightDetailsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrievePassengerListForFlightRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrievePassengerListForFlightResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendFlightStatusUpdateRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sendFlightStatusUpdateResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="FlightService_ptt"> <wsdl:operation name="getFlightDetails"> <wsdl:input message="fli:getFlightDetailsRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="fli:getFlightDetailsResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="retrievePassengerListForFlight"> <wsdl:input message="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendFlightStatusUpdate"> <wsdl:input message="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="FlightService_pttBinding" type="fli:FlightService_ptt"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getFlightDetails"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="getFlightDetails"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="retrievePassengerListForFlight"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="retrievePassengerListForFlight"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="sendFlightStatusUpdate"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="sendFlightStatusUpdate"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="FlightService"> <wsdl:port name="FlightService_pt" binding="fli:FlightService_pttBinding"> <soap:address location="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/FlightService/FlightService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fli="com.flyinghigh/operations/flightservice" xmlns:com="com.flyinghigh/operations/common"> <xsd:import namespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/common" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/FlightService/FlightService?XSD=../Schemas/Common.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="getFlightDetailsRequest" type="fli:getFlightDetailsRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getFlightDetailsResponse" type="fli:getFlightDetailsResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="sendFlightStatusUpdateRequest" type="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="sendFlightStatusUpdateResponse" type="fli:sendFlightStatusUpdateResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="retrievePassengerListForFlightRequest" type="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="retrievePassengerListForFlightResponse" type="fli:retrievePassengerListForFlightResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="getFlightDetailsRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="getFlightDetailsResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightStatus" nillable="false" type="com:flightStatusType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Origin" nillable="false" type="com:airportType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Destination" nillable="false" type="com:airportType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DepartureTime" nillable="false" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ArrivalTime" nillable="false" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sendFlightStatusUpdateRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightStatus" nillable="false" type="com:flightStatusType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sendFlightStatusUpdateResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="NewFlightStatus" nillable="false" type="com:flightStatusType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="retrievePassengerListForFlightRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="retrievePassengerListForFlightResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FlightCode" nillable="false" type="com:flightCodeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightDate" nillable="false" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="PassengerList" nillable="false" type="com:passengerListType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="com.flyinghigh/operations/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:com="com.flyinghigh/operations/common"> <xsd:complexType name="passengerListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TotalNumberOfPassengers" nillable="false" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Passengers" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Passenger" nillable="false" type="com:passengerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="passengerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FirstName" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="LastName" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Country" nillable="false" type="com:countryCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FrequentFlyerNumber" nillable="false" type="com:frequentFlyerNumberType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Seat" nillable="false" type="com:seatType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="airportType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IATACode" nillable="false" type="com:iataAirportType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Name" nillable="false" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Country" type="com:countryCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="City" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="alpha3Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>3-char uppercase strings only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="iataAirportType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the three letter IATA identification for airports; see for example http://www.world-airport-codes.com/ and http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha3Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="flightStatusType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Idle"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Boarding"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Boarding Complete"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Closed"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="flightCodeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CarrierCode" nillable="false" type="com:carrierCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FlightNumber" nillable="false" type="com:flightNumberType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="flightNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A flight number. Flight numbers are integer values within the range of [0-9999]. Example: 1234</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:maxInclusive value="9999"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="frequentFlyerNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The frequent flyer number type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="12"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{1}[0-9]{6,11}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="carrierCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the two letter IATA identification for airlines (carriers); see for example http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airline_codes-All</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha2Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="seatType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Seat indication, from 1A to 99M</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="3"/> <xsd:pattern value="[0-9]{1,2}[A-M]{1}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="countryCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>the code is the unique two letter ISO 3166-1 indication for a country - see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2 and http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/country_codes.htm</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="com:alpha2Type"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="alpha2Type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>2-char uppercase strings only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="2"/> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>
